website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice for the kitchen. Also good for light household use.
cons: This cooking torch does not come with butane

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: Amazon filtered the previous review ... seems dodgy that they'd do that as the content is crucial. I ordered this after seeing a few glowing online reviews. However, on the very first fill, this torch leaked out the butane put in it — you could hear the hissing sound at the head (and smell the butane). It was returned.
customer_reviews.author: NorCalMod

customer_reviews.title: Fill Valve Faulty
customer_reviews.text: This product works fine but it does not fill with butane properly. I bought 3 different cans of butane trying to fill it up correctly. Each one sprayed butane all over my hands and only a little went in the torch.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best torch for the kitchen I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best torch for the kitchen I have ever had I was thoroughly impressed when I got this torch the single thing I like about it the best is that the flame is adjustable it can be very small or very large the other thing that I really liked is it has a visible fuel gauge I give this 25 stars at least ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️🌟 Dr Bear
customer_reviews.author: Dr Bear

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold butane
customer_reviews.text: Been using butane torches daily for a couple years and this is the worst torch I’ve used. I spent more money in butane Trying To Get it to hold butane than the torch is worth. It just won’t hold the butane
customer_reviews.author: Serina

customer_reviews.title: Big flame!
customer_reviews.text: I love this torch! It has a big flame that heats my nail great! Less reclaim in the bubbler, means less waste of product. The problem people are having with filling is the same with most torches, if you don't hold it perfectly straight up and down some will spray out. Also it is not good to fill completely to the top.
customer_reviews.author: Robert  C. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, amazing torch for anything that would need a torch lol
customer_reviews.text: Love it, best torch I've owned for the price and definitely passes up other more expensive torch's in terms of how well it works. The only downside to this torch is i can't seem to fill it up even half way to Max, maybe it's just mine but idk the torch is still awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Does not work more than one time.
customer_reviews.text: I am a pastry chef. I used this once for an event and it would not light on its own with using the igniter. Had to use a lighter to start. I stored it away right side up because it still had fuel in it. I went to use it today for a wedding to tourch creme brûlées and it would not work at all! I had to run and buy another one which slowed me down in getting my desserts done. I am sorry but I would not buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Candy’s Creations

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it's off completely, I woke up to it being completely empty a couple times.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this torch. I use it to heat my honey straw and it works perfectly. The only problem I have is putting the butane in it. I have a hard time filling it everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie peer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little torch. This is the 2nd one I have purchased and the quality is excellent. I use them for my fireplaces.
customer_reviews.author: Luke T

customer_reviews.title: A fun kitchen toy!
customer_reviews.text: My wife's favorite dessert is creme brulee, and, after our 54th anniversary, I finally decided to make it for her. Of course, the torch is a necessary part of the process. (Browning under the broiler produced uneven results.) It's a gee-whiz kind of gadget that produced the perfect crisp caramel topping . Just using it once was enough fun that the purchase was worth it. I can't wait to use it for browning chicken and--of course--making creme brulee again very soon. By the way, you have to order butane fuel separately.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my baking use.. But ended up using it for my art work.. It works so great to get air bubbles out of acrylic pours
customer_reviews.author: CAH

customer_reviews.title: Must read ALL the directions
customer_reviews.text: I’m still playing around with this. So far it’s going well but takes some practice. The results have met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Pop

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Waited 30 days before writing the review. The torch is broken and now useless. Refilled the piece 4x and on the 4th time the fill valve began leaking very badly making it useless trash. You cant fill it all the way anyway so I knew it wasn't overfilling it that caused failure. It drinks butane like no other even at its lowest setting. It's a sloppy flame wish it was more pin point and it's very loud so stealthiness is out of the question. The base it comes with fits snug at first but after a few days it slips off all the time! Save your money up for a Blazer or other higher quality torch.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ramming

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions!
customer_reviews.text: You definitely have to actually read to refill it correctly.. I saw some reviews that said it was hard. It isnt. As long as you read. Maybe reading is hard for some people? It's a great little torch. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Adria Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great torch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its a very nice torch, it has an extremely long flame when turned all the way up. They work well with all torching needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: gauge seems broker on mine
customer_reviews.text: it was also impossible to fill the torch.. it spilled everywhere instead.
customer_reviews.author: abnopanda

customer_reviews.title: Spews butane everywhere while trying to fill.
customer_reviews.text: Spewed butane all over while trying to fill it.. bought it because of the initial good reviews, but checked again after being covered in butane to see people with the same issue. Something funky with the review system. Returned immediately
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the box, the adjustable flame knob on the back fell off and crumbled into several pieces. The box was not damaged when the product arrived, and the torch still arrived broken. Product is cheaply made and not worth the price. Next time, I’ll invest a few more dollars on a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product
customer_reviews.text: Bought the same or so I though one about a year ago it finally wore out I liked it so much I ordered another one and to my surprise it was about half the price of the original one. Once I got it I realized why it was half price it leaks butane out daily. Guess you get what you pay for this half price model is JUNK!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Walter W Davis

customer_reviews.title: Still a good torch BUT
customer_reviews.text: I,ve had the torch for about a month now. Like a lot of other people I had trouble with the base falling off. They say thr base must be removed to fill with gas. No so. The Ronson 290 ml Butane connection will reach through the base. I drilled the hole in the base out to 1/4 inch, and stuck the base on with double sided sticky tape and Bingo. It works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded All Expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the culinary torch to use as a travel torch for our silversmith business. I was hoping a culinary torch wood provide a consistent & hot flame. This torch exceeded anything I could hope for and we use it nearly everyday in the shop. For the price we figured we could just buy another one when this one stops working....... I don’t see any change from day one. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 (whole) months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on October 18, 2019. Today is December 14, 2019. It will no longer spark. I’ve used it almost every day since it arrived (yea, 2 day shipping). It clicks, has fuel, but no spark. I won’t be purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Torch is alright.
customer_reviews.text: It seems the torch does not hold a lot of butane at once and the flame can be pretty huge, so you do feel it up often. If you are using it for cooking purposes then the butane should last you a little longer in between fill-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn & Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kitchen and was impressed with the many uses I found for it. But it ended up being a life saver when we built our new epoxy countertops. I was amazed at how well it worked in getting the bubbles out of the epoxy when it's being poured. Very versatile and easy to use. It produces an excellent flame with a nice ability to control it. Great value for the money, I will definitely buy again for myself and as a nice innovate gift for others.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Walters

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife last Christmas. We hadn't used it until this past weekend. The torch spit a small flame for about one second, then died. I checked the fuel level, it was fine. I tried it a few more times while adjusting the flame adjustment knob which broke off in my hand while simply turning it. I continued to try to light it dozens of times without success. DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY HARD TO FILL UP
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size but it's extremely hard to fill it up. Haven't been able to use it because I can't get the butane in it. Tried taking it to a smoke shop and they couldn't get it filled either. I missed the window to return it.
customer_reviews.author: ARoss

customer_reviews.title: Low Price Torch that works well!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for what I bought it for, Crème Brule! The instructions seemed thorough, I would suggest reading the instructions over once before you start filling the torch with fuel and then read step by step as you go. It was difficult to fill and we had a hard time telling when we had gotten enough of the fuel into the torch. But once we got some in there it was very easy to use! The flame was great and easy to adjust. For the cost of the torch it seems great!
customer_reviews.author: Marci Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Cheapcheap
customer_reviews.text: I should have suspected something this cheap wouldnt last. This torch may be satisfactory for light use in a kitchen for a hobbyist chef, but for a dabber its a no-go. It wont hold up to the constant heavy use, broke right after the 1 month return window closed. Thought I could save some money with this, it's not a bad looking torch. Build quality just isn't there, I bit the bullet on a more expensive Blazer big shot torch to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Can't fill it up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the recommended butane to fill the torch but I can only put a little bit in before butane overflows everywhere. So little goes in it needs refilled after 2 minutes of use
customer_reviews.author: Joshua White

customer_reviews.title: Play with Fire
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen torch is easy and fun to use. It produces everything from a little flame to a big burn, so it can do whatever you need.
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD BILLMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great value kitchen torch
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a torch for baking before and this one included simple instructions for how to use it. I also love how affordable it was! I definitely recommend getting this torch if you're looking for something inexpensive and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase! Now I know when your looking for something like this your going to go to the one with the highest reviews and the highest purchases but look no further. I bought this and am so pleased with it! Perfect for my uses and easy to use like if anything ever happened to it(such good quality so I know it’ll last) I’ll definitely buy this one again and again
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn lauscher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. From cooking to arts and crafts, this is a great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good torch
customer_reviews.text: Good torch, but not so user friendly. It lights with ease, but doen't shut off by a trigger. for my application this is a negative but it could be a plus if you need it to work while on a counter.
customer_reviews.author: Jesica Fanning

customer_reviews.title: Compact and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Torch was easy to fill after warming the butane by vigorous shaking. Works beautifully. Very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Milanak

customer_reviews.title: good torch but not for doing dabs
customer_reviews.text: honestly I got it for doing dabs and unfortunately the flame is just too big for that, otherwise it's a perfect torch for anything else, just not what I got it for
customer_reviews.author: kenwud

customer_reviews.title: Best torch I've had yet, & I've had many.
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING with a capital A! It has a porcelain heating duct, and doesn't have that crappy igniter that goes out in every other torch I've had. You can also see how much fuel it has left with a clear visual fuel measurement. It has a nice stand that holds on nicely, and can also be easily removed if desired.
customer_reviews.author: Jacinda

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Love this torch. It was extremely easy to use. I just had to make sure I found the butane tank with the long nozzle to properly fill the torch. with one fill of the torch I was able to caramelize two batched of creme brulee. I have even used it to light birthday candles when I couldn't find my matches. Inexpensive and great quality, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little culinary torch, works well even off of the cheaper gas. Make sure you tighten it well when you turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Dearman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I got this torch a few months ago and I'm very happy with it. I use it everyday for my concentrates and it has yet to let me down. Its sturdy and the flame is powerful as the description, if not more... kinda caught me off guard at first. I imagine I won't have to repurchase for a while, but when I do, I'll come right back here.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: The product overall for price and quality exceeded my expectation. I imagined i be getting a torch with one setting but this torch has and adjustable fuel flow and heats everything with ease. Although i loved the torch i have struggled to refill it with the butane cans. The torch and butane must be alligned vertically for fueling
customer_reviews.author: Braedon Kyzar

customer_reviews.title: Great torch
customer_reviews.text: Trouble filling it!! Leaks some butane?(doesn’t seal to arosel can
customer_reviews.author: Bill Loftus

customer_reviews.title: Undependable
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product when it worked~ it only worked twice and I had it less than 2 months. Last night while prepping I was able to get it working but when I went to actually use it 30 minutes later it failed again. Not sure if I just got a “dud.” My bad for not returning it within the 30 day return period window.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: It's for cooking?
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value. I use it daily and it has held up very very well.
customer_reviews.author: rory manning

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Leaks butane, using more butane with this torch than my last just from it leaking
customer_reviews.author: Knurlgirl

customer_reviews.title: Powerful flame, great for bangers
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the beat torch I have ever owned out of 10+. Huge flame, igniter is reliable. Make yourself some toasted cheese delicacies or heat that glass banger in seconds. This thing is awesome. Will buy again, if it ever actually breaks. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: RYAN H

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the culinary torch for making creme brulee at home. The product is good quality and works fine. The price is rather reasonable and lower than most of the similar products offered online. I would recommend this product to the potential new customers.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S Dorogi

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love love this torch for my needs, if I could I would order about 2 more for backup, y’all need this product this one is the one to buy!!!! 2 thumbs up an 5stars. ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: tammyshawn74

customer_reviews.title: One Hot product!
customer_reviews.text: In all seriousness this is one great torch. it is easy to refill and you don't have to hold down the trigger like on some torches. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: donovin mays

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Had this product for a few months and use it eveyday. The flame on the torch is is a lot stronger compared to most torches. The only donwside with this torch is that it does burn through fuel pretty quick. Overall i think my purchase was well worth the price and im satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: You can’t fill it
customer_reviews.text: Can’t find butane anywhere and no one ships it. I have bought about 4-5 different butane containers and you can’t get it to fill. It fills very little and the rest goes everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: nelva

customer_reviews.title: Great Price. Very Reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why some of the bad reviews, maybe a faulty product. I bought one for myself after trying out my brothers because it was great for the price. Bought two torches before that lasted under 30 days. Have had since May and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Porter

customer_reviews.title: Actually last longer then a Month!
customer_reviews.text: This torch is amazing for the price couldn’t ask for anything better. The quality is the the same as more expensive torches atleast to me!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Manikin

customer_reviews.title: Sux
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and both were problematic from the start. They don’t fill well and are inconsistent in operation.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Fernung

customer_reviews.title: Lacking safety features
customer_reviews.text: After using this several times I really don't care for it due to safety features. When you power it on let go of the button it's still running you have to turn the knob all the way to turn it off. This should not be like this in my opinion due to safety reasons. While turning the red knob you have to be very careful that you keep your eye on the flame 🔥.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Double check to be certain you have the right size butane cartridge.
customer_reviews.text: I use my Culinary Torch for making creme brulee and meringue for lemon pies. I enjoy the simplicity of use, the variable heat ranges, and the size. Ordering is simple and Liba is an excellent company. I would not hesitate to order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. BARBARA HAWKINS-HOLLEY

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Not having any experience with butane, I had my husband fill it up initially and I have been happy with this product ever since. I use it for art, not cooking. It’s quick and handy, but you have to make sure to turn the gas all the way off or it will bleed out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent torch!!Used very much in my kitchen and safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: John Migyanka

customer_reviews.title: Packs a Punch!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy enough to use. It was a little difficult to locate the butane to fill it. But after a couple tries I got it! I didn’t use it for its intended purpose. I used it on fluid pour acrylic paint to bring silicone cells to the surface
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really big flame
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why theres so many negative reviews but I'll tell you what I do know is that this torch is extremely durable, insanely easy to use If you know how to use this torch it will last a long time you can get a very large flame
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Torch cannot be filled like normal. There’s an issue with the valve that doesn’t allow filling. Essentially it’s useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great torch. Easy to fill , easily adjusted flame intensity. I use it for acrylic paint pouring .
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice little torch
customer_reviews.text: Works great! And great price... I use this all the time and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric44h

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flame and features
customer_reviews.text: Love the torch but for some reason I can't hardly get butane in it I have the long 77 on can with 5 or 6 different sizes but neither seems to work rite I have numerous models of torches and this one is by far the hardest one to add butane to
customer_reviews.author: I'm going to keep it Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Works great for  culinary and art
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works as described and very safe. I recommend this for culinary or art work. I used it for acrylic paintings and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Just a person

customer_reviews.title: Great product to value...
customer_reviews.text: Best small torch I've come across for the kitchen... Just make sure you know which way to turn off the gas, as my staff doesn't.!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the price 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: For the price mine was pretty decent, did me good for about 3 months of hard dabbing, but the ignitor went out recently, still works if you light a bic in front of it, chugs butane like a monster tho
customer_reviews.author: Travis Christopher

customer_reviews.title: I got a leaker
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first. Super fast delivery, but a couple weeks after using it, I noticed I had to fill it ever time. The butane just leaks out the bottom. Super bummed!
customer_reviews.author: chas richardson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted! Perfect size and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good quality torch
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this torch for my epoxy project. Easy to use, exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Great value for the money! I only wish that it was a push/hold button instead of a knob. I worry about dropping it from time to time. That’s simply my personal preference. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kuchenreuther

customer_reviews.title: Torch works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have probably more than 3 months with this torch and it has work excellent. I use it for art projects or resin projects sometimes marshmallow cookies It works great for everything highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Cristal V.

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best for sure
customer_reviews.text: Really great torch. I have gone through quite a few different kinds of torches in the past and this has been the best and most long lasting by far. Really excellent customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: RacheL

customer_reviews.title: refilling
customer_reviews.text: lost more fuel than than refilled with the ronson refill
customer_reviews.author: KATHRYN

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT now leave me be till I need a new torch
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike was getting a letter because I didn't do a review
customer_reviews.author: duell keeney

customer_reviews.title: Great torch. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Torch was amazing. Sturdy base that easily fits and unfits the torch for refilling; easy to use dial for fuel rate and trigger for ignition. Great torch. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, even flow
customer_reviews.text: Great little torch for cooking or art work. I'm using it for both. Don't have to hold in the button while burning - saves a tired hand. Nice rubbery handle to keep a good grip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this it works awesome for my resin crafts and pour paintings! Top quality easy to use I love this !
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia L

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 2 days
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on Wednesday. Worked great for 2 days and it now has broke. The knob has completely crumbled. Not satisfied with this torch.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Liked very much. It is good quality. After the first one I ordered a second.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry minks

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Very bad, bought this torch and it fills up and doesn’t stay filled or even show that it filled . Do not buy this and waste your money like I did
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have been wanting a kitchen torch for some time and found this one. It is so easy to use and it's a well made product. So glad we found it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always lights
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to light my gas after the grill ignitor but the dust Works great and better than expected
customer_reviews.author: Michael DeCorah

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it needs to and works great. Had no issues
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this purchase. It met my expectations & I really like that it's compact size allows for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Gonzalez Jr

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete order
customer_reviews.text: It was advertised with butane bottle refills. And here I have a business and a torch I can’t use because it doesn’t have all the necessary elements.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Huizenga

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Filling it up, sucks. But other than that, I like it. It can be empty & when you go to fill it up, it spills out like it’s full, but it’s not 🤬
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Holley

customer_reviews.title: good torch
customer_reviews.text: decent torch for the money you wont really get much better for the price. ive had it for about 6 months and use it everyday with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: This product works great I've had no issues with it came on time it's worth the money would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.text: Works well juat like the description says. Its nice and easy to handle. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: tooshorty29

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This torch is amazing. It’s super easy to refill, and it’s never let us down. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Alexus Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Works for heating up my quarts banger.
customer_reviews.text: The butane that you put in over time leaks out slowly I realized so I only but enough butane for 1 sesh.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: It is a must buy for a baking equipment
customer_reviews.text: It is handy and portable, super easy to use and keep. Very good if you want to use it for baking or slight roast of your sashimi
customer_reviews.author: Chee Hao

customer_reviews.title: Great torch
customer_reviews.text: This torch came fast and works great. My wife uses it for her meringue frosting on cupcakes and pies for her home business.
customer_reviews.author: James Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this torch it works amazing! I have used it for a wide range of things. Lol from dabs to dessert souffles! Perfect size, Heats quickly, and really durable!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought the torch it arrived super quickly and works amazing for the price so simple to use and refill, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lucas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I use this just about every morning to melt the brown sugar on top of my oatmeal! Love this product!

product_meta.title: Culinary Torch for Kitchen Cooking Food Butane Blow Torch - Dabbing, Creme Brulee, Grilling (Silver)
product_meta.description:
Envision yourself creating amazing foods and desserts on par with the finest restaurants in the world? You are one step closer by using our Professional Culinary Torch. Made for reliability, safety and ease of use, the LiBa Culinary Torch brings the Professional's experience to your own home kitchen. If it requires a flame, our torch is your best tool!

- Caramelize creme brulees, brown meringues, glaze hams, sear steaks, grill seafood, melt cheeses, toast breads, even throw a s’mores party and much more. Let your creativity guide you!
- Our extended angled nozzle keeps your hand safely away from the flame and allows for easy and precise maneuvering.
- Our Anti-Flare technology and Safety lock allows for you to operate the torch Worry-Free.
- Using our torch is as easy as 1-2-3. Simply slide the safety lock to off, turn the flame knob until you hear the gas flow and press on the ignition. Instantly, you have a flame that can burn to an amazing 2730 degrees!
- Made with a durable heavy duty metal body, our torch was built to last.
- The added convenience of a Fuel Gauge Window never leaves you guessing between refills.
- Depending on the size of the flame, the torch can burn up to 60 minutes.



All of this with our 100% NO Questions, NO Hassle Money Back/Replacement Guarantee for 90 Days!

Soon you will realize how indispensable this torch is to your cooking repertoire. From our kitchen to yours. Enjoy! 

We recommend using the Ronson butane fuel, can be found searching for ASIN: B002RBEK74 on Amazon
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL QUALITY CULINARY TORCH - Used in the finest restaurants. Ideal for caramelizing sugar atop creme brulee, glazing a baked ham, searing a steak, roasting bell peppers, melting cheese and toasting bread crumbs.

SAFETY FIRST- Features Anti-Flare technology with Safety Lock for Worry Free operation. EASY TO USE - Simply slide safety lock to off, turn flame knob until you hear the gas flow and press on ignition button. Voila, instant flame that can burn to an amazing 2730 degrees!
DURABLE - Built with a heavy duty metal body for long lasting use. Includes a FUEL GAUGE WINDOW for easy refill indication. Can burn up to 60 minutes.(Butane not included).
NO HASSLE WARRANTY- Includes a 3 year WARRANTY with our 90 day "No questions asked" money back/replacement guarantee!
RECOMMENDED BUTANE FUEL BRANDS: ZIPPO OR RONSON BRANDS FOUND ON AMAZON, SEARCH FOR B0062YBCNW OR B001QP8DOS. PORTABLE CAMPING FUEL BUTANE WILL CAUSE LEAKS AND WON'T FIT THE REFILL NOZZLE.
